channel.title: Rsvps on In loving memory of Scott Perry
channel.description: Recent content in Rsvps on In loving memory of Scott Perry

item.title: Memorial RSVP
item.description:
Please come celebrate Scott’s life and spirit with us at Manuel’s Tavern, 602 North Highland Ave NE, Atlanta, GA on Sunday, March 30, 11:30 am-2:00 pm. Your rsvp is appreciated so we have an approximate count for brunch.

Prepare to share your stories about Scott though the years with friends and family, some of whom joined Scott for his 35th birthday party at Manuel’s in 1988.
